job.title: Help Desk Technician
job.description: <p>Our Client, a national healthcare company is looking for people with outstanding&nbsp;phone/communication skills to work as part of their new digital support team&nbsp;that will assist phlebotomists with any IT issues. You will&nbsp;troubleshoot Level 1 over the phone and&nbsp;occasionally&nbsp;in person as part of a 24x7 call center.&nbsp;There could be some local travel. You must be a US citizen and be able to pass a background check and drug test.&nbsp;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>Must haves:</p><ul><li>Great Customer Service</li><li>Level 1 tech skills</li><li>Wants to grow in tech</li><li>Able to remotely troubleshoot issues</li><li>Possible travel&nbsp;up&nbsp;to&nbsp;25% so&nbsp;&nbsp;must have a vehicle</li><li>Remote and Nationwide</li><li>Windows 7 and Windows 10 install and troubleshooting</li><li>Familiarity with help desk ticketing systems</li><li>Familiarity with Active Directory and VPN big +</li><li>Network printer installation and configuration</li><li>Network printer installation and configuration</li></ul>
